entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:11 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 3:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 7.0°C
Wind: S 33 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to a few flurries this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
